thread.title: Jim Nelson
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Jim Nelson

author: Jim Nelson
title: Jim Nelson
text: Every time I shop at B&H I find the most compelling products at the most alluring prices. I shop frequently and have always been extremely satisfied. The web site is easy to navigate, the check out is slick and reviewing makes the final settings easy to view. I got free expedited shipping and couldn't ask for more;
